Hook.title: I like to build websites using Javascript, Next.js, Tailwindcss, PHP and Drupal.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: In a few words
About.description: I've been a full-stack developer for 3 years, I'm currently doing a work-study program to qualify as a computer and information systems expert on the Ynov Lyon campus. Thanks to the wide range of technologies I master, I remain flexible for all types of projects.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.subtitle: Check out my latest works
Projects.description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

BoSante.description: Creation of a showcase site. The aim is to present the various services offered by Bo Santé.

SafeArea.description: Web application enabling companies to manage employee complaints securely and anonymously.
